p: Data used in this analysis represent all RVFV strains deposited in GenBank (as of August 2014; http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/nuccore), and include full sequences of the L, M, and S segments. If two or more records were available from the same isolate, we included the more recently sequenced version in analyses. Sequences for which the GenBank metadata listed no country of origin were excluded from those analyses. Sequences were aligned using the MUSCLE plugin [ 26] in the MEGA 6 software [ 27].
